Publication.title: Integration of Cloud Computing in The Public Sector: A Case Study in the Austrian Government

Cloud computing is not only a technology for the private sector rather it also can benefit sector in many ways [2]. It makes e-government systems cheaper and accelerates the adaptation of use of IT by [3]. Cloud computing is high on the agenda of Obama administration and is being used by federal and local governments significant benefits [4]. In the European Union the potentials Cloud computing have been recognized and the Cloud being pushed forward, not only because of its cost saving but also because of its impact on the environment. work we have conducted a case study for integration of computing in the Austrian Public sector. The contribution of is identification of the requirements of the public sector obstacles for integration of cloud computing in the Austrian sector.
